member.summary: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.

member.name: T:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator
member.summary: Helper class that tries to locate the 7-Zip executable

member.name: M:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator.Locate
member.summary: Tries to locate the 7-Zip executable on the current system
member.remarks: You do not need to call this normally. The 'Location' property will automatically initiate a search the first time it is called. Only call this method if you suspect the system might have changed and wish to rescan for the 7-Zip executable.

member.name: M:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator.findUsingRegistry
member.summary: Tries to locate 7-Zip using its registry path
member.returns: The path to the 7-Zip executable or null if not found

member.name: M:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator.findOnWindows
member.summary: Tries to locate 7-Zip in its default path on a windows system
member.returns: The path to the 7-Zip executable or null if not found

member.name: M:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator.searchWindowsProgramFilesFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Searches the program files folder for a 7-Zip executable
member.returns: The path to the 7-Zip executable or null if not found

member.name: M:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator.findOnUnix
member.summary: Tries to locate 7-Zip in its default path on a unix system
member.returns: The path to the 7-Zip executable or null if not found

member.name: F:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator.locationAttempted
member.summary: Whether we attempted to locate 7-Zip already

member.name: F:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator.location
member.summary: The location of the 7-Zip executable or null

member.name: P:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.SevenZipLocator.Location
member.summary: The location of the 7-Zip executable or null if not found
member.remarks: Will search for 7-Zip on the system the first time it is called, so it may block for a moment before returning.

member.summary: Helper class for working with system paths on windows

member.name: M:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.KnownFolders.Vista.getKnownFolderPath(System.Guid)
member.summary: Obtains the path of a system folder on windows
member.param: ID of the system folder whose path will be obtained
member.returns: The path to the requested system folder

member.name: F:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.KnownFolders.Vista.programFiles
member.summary: "Program Files" folder, depending on the running application's bitness

member.name: F:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.KnownFolders.Vista.programFilesX64
member.summary: "Program Files" folder on x64 systems, undefined on x86 systems

member.name: F:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.KnownFolders.Vista.programFilesX86
member.summary: "Program Files (x86)" folder on x64 systems and "Program Files" folder on x86 systems.

member.name: M:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.KnownFolders.Vista.SHGetKnownFolderPath(System.Guid,System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Retrieves the full path of a known folder identified by the folder's KNOWNFOLDERID
member.param: KNOWNFOLDERID that identifies the folder
Retrieval options. This value can be 0; otherwise, one or more of the KNOWN_FOLDER_FLAG values
An access token that represents a particular user. If this parameter is NULL, which is the most common usage, the function requests the known folder for the current user

When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that specifies the path of the known folder. The calling process is responsible for freeing this resource once it is no longer needed by calling CoTaskMemFree()
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise

member.name: P:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.KnownFolders.Vista.ProgramFilesPath
member.summary: Path of the program files folder

member.name: P:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.KnownFolders.Vista.ProgramFilesPathX86
member.summary: Path of the 32 bit program files folder, even in a 64 bit environment

member.name: P:Nuclex.NAnt.Tasks.Helpers.KnownFolders.Vista.ProgramFilesPathX64
member.summary: Path of the 64 bit program files folder, even in a WOW32 environment
